body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Ann Cooper Bowman. Father of Perry Lee Bowman and John Bowman.
Kentucky native. Married Sarah Ann Cooper Bowman in 1851 in Marion County, Kentucky. Farmer in Marion County in 1860.
